data.text:
A collection of trailers, promos, and other content narrated by Mark Elliott (1939-2021).

101 Dalmatians (1961)[]

1991 Re-release Trailer[]

"Walt Disney Pictures presents the return of 101 of your favorite Disney characters...versus Cruella De Vil...one of the most outrageous Disney villains of all."

"She wants the dogs...and she'll stop at nothing to get her way. Now, it's the craziest rescue ever."

"This summer, get ready for daring escapes...surprising twists and turns...and some of the funniest Disney characters you'll ever meet."

"They're all together...in one of the best-loved animated motion pictures of all time. 101... (Roger: 101!) Dalmatians!"

1991 Re-release TV Spot 1[]

"Walt Disney Pictures brings you 101 thrills...101 spills..."

"101 ways to have a good time...with 101 Dalmatians!"

"One of Disney's all-time, all-fun animated hits is heading your way...only at a theater near you. Don't miss Walt Disney's classic, 101... (Roger: 101!) Dalmatians."

"Rated G."

1991 Re-release TV Spot 2[]

"From Walt Disney Pictures, the word is out. 101 Dalmatians is back! The puppies are getting into trouble, the whole family's going into action and they'll stop at nothing to rescue them. It's all part of the fun of one of Disney's all-time animated favorites, only at a theater near you. It's Walt Disney's classic, 101 Dalmatians. Rated G. Starts Friday, July 12th at a theater near you!"

1991 Re-release TV Spot 3[]

"From Walt Disney Pictures, 101 Dalmatians are in danger. Three villains are on their tail. Now, everyone's pitching in for the most outrageous rescue ever. It's Walt Disney's classic, 101 Dalmatians. Rated G!"

1994 International Reissue Trailer[]

"Walt Disney Pictures brings you 101 thrills...101 spills...101 ways to have a good time...with 101 Dalmatians!"

"One of Disney's all-time, all-fun animated hits is heading your way...only at a theater near you. Don't miss Walt Disney classic, 101... (Roger: 101!) Dalmatians."

1999 VHS TV Spot[]

2008 International Platinum Edition 2-Disc DVD Trailer[]

"Walt Disney's 101 Dalmatians! For the first time on 2-Disc Platinum Edition DVD. One of the most beloved Disney classics of all time! Now spectacularly restored, with enhanced picture and sound."

"With all-new bonus features, including games, a music video and 101 Virtual Dalmatians."

"Walt Disney's 101 Dalmatians! For the first time on 2-Disc Disney DVD...but only for a limited time."

101 Dalmatians (1996)[]

Trailer 1[]

"Coming only to theaters this Thanksgiving...one of Walt Disney's all-time animated favorites...comes to life."

"101 Dalmatians! Featuring 101 of the furriest...and funniest stars you've ever seen...versus the meanest, nastiest and most outrageous Disney villain of all...Cruella de Vil."

"Walt Disney Pictures presents, Glenn Close, in an all-new live action motion picture event."

"101 Dalmatians."

VHS TV Spot[]

"Your favorite puppies are on video, for you to own."

"They're having 101 wild adventures, 101 breathtaking escapes, and 101 high flying surprises. And now, you can see 101 Dalmatians...in your very own home."

"Glenn Close. Disney's 101 Dalmatians. On video, rated G."

ABC Promo[]

"Bark, if you're gonna watch 101 Dalmatians. For the first time on television, 101 Dalmatians. ABC Sunday!"

101 Dalmatians II: Patch's London Adventure (2003)[]

Teaser[]

"For 2002...Walt Disney Pictures presents...an all-new sequel to the animated classic!"

"Premiering only on video and DVD...101 Dalmatians II: Patch's London Adventure! Coming to Disney DVD and video, this fall!"

Alt: "Premiering only on video and DVD...101 Dalmatians: The Animated Sequel! Watch for it on video and Disney DVD in 2002."

Trailer[]

"It's one of Disney's most beloved animated classics. And now. it's an all-new movie - 101 Dalmatians II: Patch's London Adventure!"

"Patch felt lost in a sea of spots...until he learned what it takes...to become a one-of-a-kind hero. It's a one-of-a-kind movie!"

"Walt Disney Pictures proudly presents, 101 Dalmatians II: Patch's London Adventure! Coming soon to Disney DVD and video."

Alt: "Premiering on Disney DVD and video January 21st, 2003."

2008 Special Edition release[]

"Walt Disney's original classic 101 Dalmatians has touched generations with its humor and heart...and now...the story continues...for the first time on Special Edition DVD. It's 101 Dalmatians II: Patch's London Adventure."

"Patch feels lost in a sea of spots. But when he sets out of his own, he discovers that standing out from the crowd can be a lot harder than he thought."

"Now, with the help of some new friends...he'll find the strength to become a one-of-a-kind hero."

"With very special bonus features including an all-new game and cool music videos. It's a one-of-a-kind DVD. Disney's 101 Dalmatians II: Patch's London Adventure. Coming soon to Disney DVD for a limited time only."

101 Dalmatians Animated Storybook CD-ROM Promo[]

"Now, you can bring the magic of Disney's 101 Dalmatians to life on your home computer, with Disney's Animated Storybook: 101 Dalmatians, on CD-ROM. With the click of a mouse, you can read along...learn new words...and hear them defined with the magic of poetry. You can even sing along with six fun songs. There are also four interactive games with multiple skill levels, for hours and hours of fun learning. And you help foil Cruella's plan...and bring the puppies safely home. Disney's Animated Storybook: 101 Dalmatians, available on Windows and Macintosh CD-ROM."

101 Dalmatians Christmas/Beauty and the Beast: The Enchanted Christmas/The Santa Clause/Winnie the Pooh and Christmas Too (1998)[]

101 Dalmatians: Escape from DeVil Manor CD-ROM Promo[]

"Bored with the same old computer games? Now, there's a new breed of adventure game on CD-ROM. Disney's 101 Dalmatians: Escape from De Vil Manor. Roger's game from the movie explodes onto your home computer, you play the part of Patches. It's up to you to find a way to get out of the manor, solve challenging puzzles...set traps for Horace and Jasper and become the hero who saves the day. 101 Dalmatians: Escape from De Vil Manor, coming this may on CD-ROM from Disney interactive."

21 Jump Street (1987-1991) on Fox Promos[]

"Sunday on Fox...a student tries to hire Hanson to commit a murder and he has to find out why. It's the new hit series 21 Jump Street, Sunday on your Fox station."

KTTV Promo[]

The 26th Annual Kennedy Center Honors (2003) 2004 VHS Trailer[]

"For the first time ever, celebrate the very best of entertainment on DVD and Video, The Kennedy Center Honors America's best loved comedian Carol Burnett, the Godfather of Soul James Brown director extraordinaire Mike Nichols Country Star singer Loretta Lynn and Itzhk Pearlman in The 26th Annual Kennedy Center Honors

The 26th Annual Kennedy Center Honors an all-new special New to DVD and Video Tuesday March 9th (Alt: 1 March 9th, 2004) (Alt: 2 Now Available)

30 Years of Bond Collection (1992) Demo VHS Trailer[]

"Three decades ago, he first exploded onto the screen. To this day, his films remain one of the most popular series in movie history, both at the box office and on home video. You know who we're talking about. Now, to celebrate the 30th anniversary of 007's first screen appearance, MGM/UA Home Video presents a collection that's sure to give your sales the Midas touch. We're offering eight of the most popular James Bond movies newly remastered from the original negatives in commemorative, highly-collectible book-style packaging and available for a limited time only priced at a seductive $19.98 each. This is a collection sure to cause a commotion and you've got our bond on it. Now, here's our spy's eye view of 30 Years of Bond."

"No Bond collection is complete without the one that started it all. Sean Connery is 007, the suave, charming and fearless agent who's an expert on weapons, women and martinis. This original feature pits everyone's favorite Bond against a bevy of beauties and the world-class mad scientist Dr. No. The stunning Ursula Andress makes her screen debut in this most sought-after 007 adventure: Dr. No."

"Based on the bestselling of all of Ian Fleming's novels, the second Bond thriller to explode on the screen has got it all from intrigue and beautiful blondes...to exotic locations and death-defying stunts. This spine-tingling saga set box office records. Sean Connery, Robert Shaw and Lotte Lenya...take it to the limit in From Russia with Love."

"007 goes for the gold in the Bond movie every collector wants. With the help of sexy aviatrix Pussy Galore and a trick-up Aston Martin...Sean Connery takes on the odd job of stopping an international gold smuggler whose target is no less than Fort Knox. Honor Blackman co-stars in everyone's favorite Bond blowout featuring Academy Award-winning sound, the wittiest 007 script...and an unforgettable title tune sung by Shirley Bassey, Goldfinger."

"Bond goes undercover...and underwater in the Bahamas in one of the most popular Bond films featuring Oscar-winning special effects. This 007 classic pits Sean Connery against the sinister forces of SPECTRE...in a menacing plot involving two atomic bombs. M, Q and Miss Moneypenny return to the line of duty as Bond finds himself behind the 8 ball in Thunderball."

"While the world teeters on the brink of World War III, Connery must infiltrate SPECTRE's secret island fortress and confront the evil-eyed Blofeld...played by renowned horror star Donald Pleasance in the fifth Bond movie featuring spectacular sets and special effects as well as all the crashes, splashes, femmes and fiends that Bond fans have come to expect...and that still takes a collector's breath away: You Only Live Twice."

"The most collectible film in the 007 series features spectacular stunts, beautiful ski bunnies, hissable henchmen and a brand-new Bond. George Lazenby makes his only appearance as the world's greatest spy alongside Telly Savalas as the bad guy Blofeld and Diana Rigg as the second Mrs. 007...in a suspense-filled thriller set on the ski slopes of Switzerland: On Her Majesty's Secret Service."

"Sean Connery's final appearance in the official Bond series...finds him in the arms of Jill St. John, takes him to the casinos of Las Vegas and lands him in the middle of one of the most exciting car chases ever filmed. With its glittering locations and Connery's polished performance...this 007 adventure broke box office records proving diamonds are a collector's best bet: Diamonds Are Forever."

"Timothy Dalton in his first outing as moviedom's most famous secret agent proves that when it comes to James Bond, nobody does it better. With a hip musical score, this raging adventure sends Dalton rocketing at 5,000 feet and racing down an alpine slope to match wits with a pair of power-mad generals...in the 007 entry that's the living end: The Living Daylights."

"Eight all-time favorite titles, three different James Bonds, all at one incredibly collectible price...just $19.98 each. This month, treat your customers to three decades of action, intrigue, romance and excitement with our 30 Years of Bond Collection, also available on Laserdisc. Nobody does it better than MGM/UA Home Video."

3 Ninjas (1992) Video Promo Commercial[]

"They were three brothers learning the ways of the ninja. What started as a game suddenly turned real. Now, three heroic kids are taking on one ruthless criminal. And they're determined to have the last laugh. 3 Ninjas. Rated PG, Parental Guidance Suggested."

3 Ninjas: High Noon at Mega Mountain (1998) Trailer[]

"Get ready for the thrill ride of the year. The 3 Ninjas are back...teamed with the ultimate ally Hulk Hogan. They're power-packed partners pumping with pure energy. Hulk Hogan. Loni Anderson. Jim Varney. 3 Ninjas: High Noon at Mega Mountain."

Across the Sea of Time IMAX (1995) Trailer[]

"You are invited to share an extraordinary journey."

"From the gates of Liberty. To the glamour of Broadway. From the world beneath it streets. To the wonders high above. Sony Pictures Classics is proud to present the new dimension in storytelling."

"Share this unforgettable voyage in spectacular Imax 3D and PSE 3D Sound. Across the Sea of Time, New York 3D. Now playing at the Sony-Imax Theater. Broadway and 68th Street."

The Adventures of the American Rabbit (1986) Trailer[]

"Faster than the speeding bunny. Able to lead high mountains in a single hop. He fights for justice. He lives for lettuce. He loves the red, white and blue. He's the American Rabbit. Clubhouse Pictures Family Films presents, the all-new movie: The Adventures of the American Rabbit!"

"From New Orleans to Niagara Falls...from the Grand Canyon to New York City...he must battle the evil Jackals and destroy the villainous Vultor. All he needs is a little help from his friends and you."

"The Adventures of the American Rabbit! From Clubhouse Pictures Family Films."

The Adventures of Batman and Robin Videos Promo[]

"The Dark Knight...The Boy Wonder...the ultimate video collection: The Adventures of Batman and Robin."

"It's their greatest battles with their most fearsome enemies: The Riddler."

"Batman and Robin are trapped inside a dangerous game, where the only rule is: Two-Face. The Dynamic Duo comes face-to-face with Two-Face...a criminal mastermind who's really flipped out."

"The Joker...the crowned prince of crime has a Christmas surprise in store for Gotham City."

"Plus, the complete untold story of Robin. The secrets of his past and how he came to be."

"Four thrilling adventures. Four awesome videos. The Adventures of Batman and Robin"

The Adventures of Brer Rabbit (2006) Trailer[]

"Premiering on DVD spring 2006. The classic tales come to life for the first time ever. in The all-new Adventures of Brer Rabbit, a hare-raising story where only one thing is certain. no matter what happens, the fur is gonna fly."

"Featuring D.L. Hughley as Brer Fox, Danny Glover as Brer Turtle. Wayne Brady as Brer Wolf, Wanda Sykes as Sister Moon. and Nick Cannon as Brer Rabbit."

"Don't miss The Adventures of Brer Rabbit, premiering on DVD spring 2006."

The Adventures of Ichabod and Mr. Toad (1949)[]

Video Trailer 1[]

"For its 50th anniversary celebration, the Disney Vault is opening to release Walt Disney's 11th full-length animated masterpiece, The Adventures of Ichabod and Mr. Toad, now on video for the first time ever."

"It's a timeless classic movie with two fabulous characters, who prove that making your dreams come true is the greatest adventure of all. Ride along with J. Thaddeus Toad on his quest for a motor car in the magical Wind in the Willows."

"And join the hilarious, one-of-a-kind, Ichabod Crane, in the unforgettable Legend of Sleepy Hollow."

"Share this animated masterpiece the way Walt Disney meant it to be seen. Own your copy of the 50th anniversary celebration release of The Adventures of Ichabod and Mr. Toad, available for the first time on video May 25th, 1999. (Alt: Now available for the first time on video.)"

Video Trailer 2[]

"The Adventures of Ichabod and Mr. Toad."

"Based on 2 unforgettable tales, The Wind of the Willows and The Legend of Sleepy Hollow."

"Share the fun of this Walt Disney's animated masterpiece, The Adventures of Ichabod and Mr. Toad."

The Adventures of Tom Thumb and Thumbelina (2002) Trailer[]

"Deep in an enchanted forest comes one of the most magical tales of all time. The all-new Adventures of Tom Thumb and Thumbelina."

"All of their lives, they felt out of place and looked for acceptance until the day, fate brought them together."

"Now, these two tiny friends are about to take off on a gigantic adventure to find their home. Now, two classic fairy tales come together for the first time with all-new songs and the all-star voice talent of Elijah Wood as Tom Thumb and Jennifer Love Hewitt as Thumbelina. The Adventures of Tom Thumb and Thumbelina! Coming soon, rated G. (Alt 1: Only on DVD and video August 6th, rated G.) (Alt 2: Now available only on DVD and video, rated G.)"

Air Bud (1997) Video Trailer[]

"From Walt Disney Home Video. His game has bite. His style is slick. And his shot is right on the nose. On December 23rd, the fur will fly."

"Disney's Air Bud. Rated PG. Own it on video!"

Air Bud: Golden Receiver (1998)[]

Trailer 1[]

Trailer 2[]

"A boy, looking to fit in...a team, looking for a miracle...and a dog, with a nose for the game. Now, the greatest three point shooter ever to walk on four legs, is tackling a whole new ballgame. Now, he's taking his team out of the dog house...and into the big time. This summer, the most unlikely rookie is football's top dog."

"Air Bud: Golden Receiver. Rated PG, coming soon to theaters."

Video Trailer[]

"A boy, looking to fit in...a team, looking for a miracle...and a dog, with a nose for the game. Now, the greatest three point shooter ever to walk on four legs, is tackling a whole new ballgame. Now, he's taking his team out of the dog house...and into the big time. The most unlikely rookie is football's top dog."

"Air Bud: Golden Receiver. Rated G."

Airborne (1993) Demo VHS Trailer[]

"Taking off in March from Warner Home Video, just when those hot teen video rental days of summer have been put on ice. When there's no sun, no sand, no surf, no problem. Here come these hot teen video rental days of spring break...and a sky-high theatrical release for fans of The Mighty Ducks, The Karate Kid, and Rookie of the Year. Get Airborne for styling teen rentals."

"Mitchell's life was a California dream until he woke up in Cincinnati. His cousin wants him to meet his friends. Now in a city where no one understands him...he's got the chance of a lifetime to become a hero by doing what he does best. In this race, it's all or nothing."

"'Look at it as The French Connection of rollerblade chases.' (Jeff Shannon, The Seattle Times) 'Spectacular and exciting.' (Jules Peiner, WNWK Radio/New York) 'A perpetually pleasing teen action-comedy that's high-flying fun.' (Roger Hurlburt, Fort Lauderdale Sun-Sentinel)"

"Airborne takes off with a scorching soundtrack of top teen hits and the awesome action of the fastest growing sport in North America that has become an annual $319 million dollar business with 12 million rollerblading fanatics nationwide!"

"And we'll fill the airwaves with our Airborne radio consumer contest in top markets nationwide, where your customers can win out-of-this-world prizes. 60-day extended pay-per-view protection, you've got it as part of Warner's solid Profit Power support.

"Airborne. From the producers of Forever Young and The Man Without a Face, starring teen favorites Shane McDermott, Seth Green, Brittany Powell. and Chris Conrad."

"They've got what it takes to put spring rentals over the top. Airborne, coming in March from Warner Home Video."

Aladdin (1992)[]

Production Teaser 1[]

"From the beginning, the magic of Disney animation has taken us to the far horizons of our imagination. From a puppeteer's workshop, to never Neverland, from the heart of the jungle, to the bottom of the sea, to an enchanted castle, we've shared experiences we'll always remember. Now, Disney animators are about to take us on a mythical magic carpet ride...to a place we've never been before, with their 31st full-length animated feature, Aladdin."

"The legend of Aladdin wouldn't be complete without a magic lamp, and that lamp wouldn't be special without a magical genie. This musical spectacular features an exciting new score by the Academy Award-winning songwriters of The Little Mermaid and Beauty and the Beast."

"Don't miss the unforgettable adventure of Aladdin, coming only to theaters for the 1992 holiday season, from Walt Disney Pictures."

Production Teaser 2[]

"Here at the Walt Disney Studios, our animators and artists are hard at work finishing our 31st all-new animated film, Aladdin. And here's a sneak peek at this very special musical adventure!"

"It's filled with wonderful new Disney characters, and six new songs from the Academy Award-winning team of The Little Mermaid and Beauty and the Beast."

"Join Aladdin and his magic lamp on the most exciting magic carpet ride ever! Don't miss the fun. Coming to theaters for Thanksgiving 1992 from Walt Disney Pictures!"

Production Teaser 3[]

"This holiday season, the Walt Disney Studios proudly presents our 31st all-new full-length animated motion picture: Aladdin. It's the most exciting magic carpet ride ever! A musical journey of mystery, and wonder...with Aladdin, his magic lamp, and some wonderful new friends...Princess Jasmine...Abu the monkey...Iago the Parrot...Jafar, the treacherous villain...and a very powerful, very special... (Genie of the Lamp!)"

"Don't miss Disney's all-new musical entertainment event, with six new songs from the Academy Award-winning composer of The Little Mermaid, and Beauty and the Beast!"

"Walt Disney Pictures presents, Aladdin!"

Trailer[]

"Three years ago, we took you to a magical journey under the sea. Last year, we took you to a place where a beautiful girl looked into the heart of a beast, and found the man of her dreams. Now, come with us, and enter a whole new world beyond your imagination, where a boy discovers a magic lamp, and a genie, who could make all his dreams come true."

"Walt Disney Pictures presents...Aladdin."

Alt: "Walt Disney Home Video presents, Aladdin."

"Imagine a whole new world full of excitement...danger...and enchantment. It's the story of a poor boy from the streets, and a beautiful girl from a palace. They were two very different people...brought together by one incredible wish."

"But the evil sorcerer Jafar has learned the secret of Aladdin's power...and he'll stop at nothing to steal it away."

"Imagine, the world at your command...only to discover the greatest power is within."

"Aladdin. Featuring six new songs from the Academy Award-winning composer of The Little Mermaid, and Beauty and the Beast."

"Coming this holiday season, Walt Disney Pictures'...Aladdin."

Alt: "Coming to video October 1st...Aladdin."

Alt 2: "Walt Disney Pictures'...Aladdin."

Rare Theatrical Reviews Trailer[]

"Three years ago, Disney's Little Mermaid thrilled audiences around the world. Last year, Beauty and the Beast became the first animated movie to receive an Oscar nomination for Best Picture of the Year. Now, Disney takes you on an adventure beyond your imagination..."

"Walt Disney Pictures presents... Aladdin. The movie Time Magazine calls 'A ravishing thrill ride... An animated Raiders of the Lost Ark. You have to see it twice.'" (Time Magazine, Richard Corliss)

"Rolling Stone says 'Robin Williams is a hip comic wonder. He might just wish himself up a cartoon Oscar.'" (Rolling Stone, Peter Travers)

"'The Disney wizards have outdone themselves again, creating another classic fairy tale, filled with fantasy, suspense and exquisite beauty.'" (ABC Radio Network, Bill Diehl)

"And Siskel and Ebert rave, 'This is an amazing piece of entertainment... Two thumbs up!'" (Siskel & Ebert)

"'It would have taken a miracle to surpass the achievement of Beauty and the Beast... The miracle's name is Aladdin. The best film of the year.'" (CBS Radio, Jim Svejds)

"Walt Disney Pictures' Aladdin. The movie USA Today gives four stars!" (USA Today, Mike Clark)

TV Spot 1[]

"From Walt Disney Pictures. When Aladdin discovered the lamp...he found a genie who gave him everything he wanted...and more than he could handle."

"It's Disney's all-new animated adventure, Aladdin! Rated G. National sneak preview Saturday, November 14th."

TV Spot 2[]

"From Walt Disney Pictures. She was a beautiful princess who dreamed of something more...and she was determined to get her way. That's when she met the boy who could make her dreams come true."

"Walt Disney Pictures presents an adventure beyond imagination...Aladdin. Rated G. National sneak preview, Saturday November 14th."

Alt: "Starts Wednesday, November 25th at a theater near you."

TV Spot 3[]

"From Walt Disney Pictures. What if you found a magic lamp...with a genie who made all your wishes come true? What if you could take off on a flying carpet...and meet wonderful new friends?"

"This holiday season, get ready for more fun than you could ever imagine...in Walt Disney Pictures' Aladdin. Rated G. Sneak preview Sunday, November 22nd."

TV Spot 4[]

"Walt Disney Pictures invites you...to get ready...get set...for the biggest adventure of all...Aladdin is here! It's a rollercoaster ride filled with fun...and it's all coming to a theater near you."

"Walt Disney Pictures' all-new Aladdin! Rated G. National sneak preview Sunday, November 22nd."

TV Spot 5[]

"Walt Disney Pictures invites you...to take off for excitement...take off for adventure...take off...with Aladdin! It's a rollercoaster ride filled with fun and surprises...and it's all coming...to a theater near you!"

"Walt Disney Pictures' all-new Aladdin! Rated G. National sneak preview Sunday, November 22nd."

TV Spot 6[]

"Walt Disney Pictures presents the movie critics have declared 'The best film of the year' (CBS Radio, Jim Svejds)... Aladdin."

"Time Magazine calls it 'Exhilarating...An animated Raiders of the Lost Ark'." (Time Magazine, Richard Corliss)

"'Two thumbs up!' rave Siskel and Ebert."

"And CBS says, 'It would have taken a miracle to surpass Beauty and the Beast... That miracle's name is Aladdin.'" (CBS Radio, Jim Svejds)

"Walt Disney Pictures' Aladdin. Rated G. National sneak preview, Sunday November 22nd."

Alt: "Starts Wednesday, November 25th at a theater near you."

Alt 2: "Now playing at a theater near you. Check newspaper for showtimes."

TV Spot 7[]

"From Walt Disney Pictures. When Aladdin rubbed the magic lamp...he unleashed a genie who's polite...who's helpful...who's eager to please. Aladdin's every wish is his command."

"Don't miss Walt Disney Pictures' all-new Aladdin. Rated G. National sneak preview Sunday, November 22nd."

Alt: "Starts Wednesday, November 25th at a theater near you."

Alt 2: "Now playing at a theater near you. Check newspaper for showtimes."

TV Spot 8[]

"From Walt Disney Pictures. Take one incredible genie...three magical wishes...and dozens of wonderful new characters...put 'em together...and you got pure Disney fun."

"This holiday season, take off on an adventure beyond imagination! Walt Disney Pictures' Aladdin! Rated G. Sneak preview Sunday, November 22nd."

Alt: "Now playing at a theater near you."

TV Spot 9[]

"This Sunday, be the first to see the special sneak preview of Walt Disney Pictures' new animated adventure, Aladdin."

"Take off on a magic carpet ride. Meet the genie who can grant your every wish...and explore a whole new world of adventure beyond imagination."

"This Sunday, November 22nd, be the first to see Walt Disney Pictures' Aladdin. Rated G. Check newspapers for theaters and showtimes."

TV Spot 10[]

"From Walt Disney Pictures. Take one incredible genie...three magical wishes...dozens of wonderful new characters...and you've got Disney's all-new animated adventure, Aladdin! Rated G. Starts Wednesday, November 25th."

Alt: "Starts Friday, November 27th."

TV Spot 11[]

"From Walt Disney Pictures. Aladdin's lamp was the most powerful force on Earth...but an evil sorcerer is determined to steal it. Now, only the courage of Aladdin...and the magic of the genie...stand in his way."

"It's Disney's all-new adventure classic, Aladdin. Rated G. Starts Wednesday, November 25th."

Alt: "Now playing at a theater near you."

TV Spot 12[]

"From Walt Disney Pictures. She was a princess who just wanted to live her own life. Now, at last, she's going to follow her heart."

"Walt Disney Pictures presents a story of adventure and romance beyond imagination...Aladdin. Rated G. Starts Wednesday, November 25th."

2004 Special Edition Trailer[]

"The magic is released...for the first time ever...on Disney DVD."

"It's an exhilarating fun-filled adventure...with the hilarious characters you love, now in a spectacular first-ever digital presentation! The Aladdin Special Edition, on Disney DVD! With bonus features fit for a sultan. Experience a deleted song, found in the Disney vault. Play new games...soar on a Virtual Magic Carpet Ride, and go beyond the movie to uncover never-before-seen movie secrets."

"The Aladdin Special Edition two-disc DVD. Coming October 5th, 2004."

UK Trailer 1[]

"Three years ago, Walt Disney Pictures took you on an incredible journey under the sea. Last year, we took you to an enchanted castle, where a beautiful girl fell in love with a beast. Now, come join us on an adventure beyond your imagination, Aladdin. It's the classic tale of the boy who found a magic lamp, with a genie who could grant his every wish, and turn him into a prince. Aladdin."

UK Trailer 2[]

"Join us on an adventure beyond your imagination, Aladdin. It's the classic tale of the boy who found a magic lamp, with a genie who could grant his every wish, and turn him into a prince. Aladdin."

1993 Home Video TV Spot[]

"Walt Disney Home Video presents Aladdin! The movie that became a sensation...is now something special on video! Disney's newest classic is fun for kids...fun for grown-ups...fun for the whole family! But hurry, it's only available for a limited time!"

"Bring home Aladdin on video, the movie everyone loves!"

1994 Home Video Moratorium Announcement[]

"Time is running out for your family to own the best-selling video of all time, Disney's smash hit, Aladdin on video! After April, Disney will no longer be selling this fabulous treasure."

"So hurry. Buy Aladdin on video, while supplies last!"

2004 Special Edition TV Spots[]

Aladdin and the King of Thieves (1996)[]

1995 Teaser[]

"It began with the greatest adventure of all (Aladdin)... Then, the thrilling sequel (The Return of Jafar)... Now, your favorite characters are back in the final chapter, Aladdin and the King of Thieves! Coming only to video, Fall '95!"

Trailer 1[]

"Aladdin showed you a whole new world. The Return of Jafar took you beyond imagination. Now, Walt Disney Home Video invites you to a celebration...with an all-new movie. The third and final chapter of the exciting trilogy: Aladdin and the King of Thieves."

"Aladdin and Jasmine's dreams are finally coming true. But a band of notorious thieves...and a long-kept secret...lead Aladdin into his greatest adventure ever."

"Aladdin and the King of Thieves features five brand-new songs, and reunites all your favorite characters from Aladdin...including the Genie, brought to life again by the one and only Robin Williams."

"This summer, live the adventure...and take part in the wedding of the century."

"Aladdin and the King of Thieves. Coming directly to video, Summer '96."

Trailer 2[]

"This summer, you can own the newest Aladdin movie...his greatest adventure ever. Aladdin and the King of Thieves."

"Featuring five brand-new songs, and reuniting all your favorite characters from Aladdin...including the Genie, brought to life once again by the one and only Robin Williams."

"This summer, live the adventure...and take part in the wedding of the century."

"Aladdin and the King of Thieves. Coming directly to video, Summer '96."

Trailer 3[]

Beauty and the Beast (1991)[]

Production Teaser[]

"In 1937, Walt Disney made motion picture history when he transformed a classic fairy tale into one of the most successful feature films of all time, Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs. For the first time, audiences were transported to a world of pure imagination filled with color, music and the incredible magic of animation. But Snow White was just the beginning; the parade of memorable Disney characters would stretch across generations, bringing to life some of the most wonderful stories ever told. And this tradition of family entertainment continues today; with Oliver & Company and The Little Mermaid, a whole new generation has been introduced to the magic and music of Disney animation. Oliver & Company brought together the vocal talents of superstars Bette Midler and Billy Joel to help us experience New York City Disney-style. In the Academy Award-winning Little Mermaid, the Disney family grew even larger with new friends like Ariel, Flounder and Scuttle, and a host of unforgettable faces who took us... (Sebastian [singing]: Under the Sea!)"

"Now, the Walt Disney Studio is preparing its 30th full-length animated feature film, Beauty and the Beast. And we have a rare opportunity to go behind the scenes and see firsthand just how the magic is made."

"Once we've created the characters in the story, we record the voices that begin to bring the characters to life."

"Like so many other great Disney films, Beauty and the Beast is a musical. So we've reassembled the Academy Award-winning songwriting team from The Little Mermaid to create those very special songs."

"Coming only to theaters in fall 1991."

Trailer[]

"Walt Disney Pictures presents its all-new 30th full-length animated motion picture. The classic story of Beauty and the Beast. He was a lonely beast cursed by a mysterious spell and she was the beautiful young girl who could set him and his kingdom free. They were two complete opposites...until something wonderful happened.

"It's a story filled with fun...adventure...and dozens of wonderful new Disney characters."

"Featuring six new songs from the Academy Award-winning composer and lyricist of The Little Mermaid."

"This holiday season. Share the fun, the magic and the music of an entertainment event you'll never forget."

"Disney's Beauty and the Beast."

Rare Theatrical Reviews Trailer[]

"Two years ago, Walt Disney Pictures reinvented the animated feature, not only with an eye toward pleasing children, but also with an older, savvier audience in mind. Disney truly bridged a generation gap with The Little Mermaid. Now, lightning has definitely struck twice, with Beauty and the Beast." (New York Times, Janet Maslin)

"The most anticipated animated motion picture of the year is what critics are now calling the best movie of the year. Newsweek says, 'It has the feel of a classic. Sophisticated and funny, romantic and scary, with witty, memorable songs that put current Broadway fare to shame.'" (Newsweek, David Ansen)

"Rolling Stone calls Beauty and the Beast 'Thrilling...an animated feature that represents Disney artistry at it's peak...and you don't have to bring a kid along to have fun.' (Rolling Stone, Peter Travers)"

"Siskel and Ebert give it 'Two enthusiastic thumbs up! It's on a level with Broadway stage productions, and it's a legitimate candidate for Oscar consideration as Best Picture of the Year.'" (Siskel & Ebert)"

"And Good Morning America agrees Beauty and the Beast is 'Breathtaking. This is up there with Cinderella, Pinocchio, even Snow White... An animated film has never been nominated for the Best Picture Oscar... This should be the first.' (Good Morning America, Joel Siegel)"

"Disney's Beauty and the Beast."

TV Spot 1[]

"From Walt Disney Pictures, she was a young girl who dreamed of romance. He was a prince cursed to live inside the body of a Beast. But when she looked into his heart, she found the man of her dreams. It's Disney's all-new 30th full-length animated motion picture, Beauty and the Beast. Rated G. Starts Friday, November 22nd at a theater near you!"

TV Spot 2[]

"From Walt Disney Pictures, a beautiful young girl pursued by a ruthless villain and surrounded by danger. But now, a brave Beast and his magical army will come to the rescue. Walt Disney's Beauty and the Beast. Rated G!"

Join Mrs. Potts for a world of adventure and fun in Belle's Enchanted Library, experience the stories behind the scenes of your favorite Disney classics, told by some of your favorite celebrity hosts (including The Lion King, The Jungle Book, The Hunchback of Notre Dame, Cinderella, Sleeping Beauty, Pocahontas and Mulan)! With Cogsworth and Lumiere, you can witness the creation of a masterpiece, through virtual galleries of artwork, layouts, and animation. And the whole family can join Chip for magical fun and games...help break the spell to be human again, in the ultimate adventure...test your memory and musical skill in Chip's Musical Challenge...and finally, if you're brave enough, discover the secrets of the West Wing. Now, the tale as old as time is new again. The Two-Disc DVD Special Edition of Beauty and the Beast. Come be our guest...in a world of enchantment. Tuesday, October 8th."

"It's the world premiere of a brand-new Disney classic coming only to video, a never-before-told chapter in the Beauty and the Beast legend. The classic tale of a young girl, her enchanted friends...and the only thing that just might touch the heart of a beast: The spirit of Christmas. Beauty and the Beast: The Enchanted Christmas, reunites all the original cast...including Robby Benson, Paige O'Hara, Jerry Orbach, David Ogden Stiers and Angela Lansbury...and two new star-studded voices: Tim Curry as Forte, the evil pipe organ; and Bernadette Peters as Angelique, the castle decorator."

Trailer 2[]

Give your family the perfect gift, give them Beauty and the Beast: The Enchanted Christmas, now available on video."
